InstructionData.Title: N2O Combusion Centrifuge Example
InstructionData.Author: SMiLeY.NET
InstructionData.Instructions: alias Cenrifuge d0 alias CurrentReagents r0 alias CurrentRPM r1 alias CurrentStress r2 alias OnOff r3 define MinRPM 15 define MaxStress 80.0 define HigherStress 50.0 define HighStress 35.0 define MedStress 25.0 define LowStress 20.0 define MedTransRPM 200 # 200+ med speed define HighTransRPM 400 #400+ high speed define HigherTransRPM 700 #700+ higher speed define MaxTransRPM 1000 #1000+ max speed define MaxReagents 2500 define MinReagents 2 preStart: l CurrentRPM d0 Rpm bgt CurrentRPM MedTransRPM main s d0 On 0 s d0 Throttle 0 s d0 CombustionLimiter 0 blt CurrentRPM MinRPM checkReagents j preStart checkReagents: l CurrentReagents d0 Reagents blt CurrentReagents MinReagents close bgt CurrentReagents MinReagents empty j checkReagents empty: s d0 Open 1 j checkReagents close: s d0 Open 0 s d0 On 1 l CurrentStress d0 Stress bnez CurrentStress close j main main: l CurrentStress d0 Stress l CurrentRPM d0 Rpm l CurrentReagents d0 Reagents l OnOff d0 On beqz OnOff spinDown bgt CurrentStress MaxStress spinDown bgt CurrentReagents MaxReagents spinDown blt CurrentRPM MedTransRPM lowSpeed # less 200 blt CurrentRPM HighTransRPM medSpeed # less 400 blt CurrentRPM HigherTransRPM highSpeed # less 800 blt CurrentRPM MaxTransRPM higherSpeed # less 1000 bgt CurrentRPM MaxTransRPM maxSpeed #1000+ j main lowSpeed: l CurrentStress d0 Stress bgt CurrentStress LowStress pulseSlow s d0 On 1 s d0 Open 0 s d0 Throttle 10 s d0 CombustionLimiter 10 sleep 2 s d0 Throttle 0 s d0 CombustionLimiter 0 sleep 2 j main medSpeed: l CurrentStress d0 Stress bgt CurrentStress MedStress pulseSlow s d0 Throttle 20 s d0 CombustionLimiter 20 sleep 2 s d0 Throttle 10 s d0 CombustionLimiter 10 sleep 2 yield j main highSpeed: l CurrentStress d0 Stress bgt CurrentStress HigherStress pause s d0 Throttle 30 s d0 CombustionLimiter 30 sleep 2 s d0 Throttle 20 s d0 CombustionLimiter 20 sleep 2 j main higherSpeed: l CurrentStress d0 Stress bgt CurrentStress HighStress highSpeed s d0 Throttle 60 s d0 CombustionLimiter 60 sleep 2 s d0 Throttle 40 s d0 CombustionLimiter 40 sleep 1 j main maxSpeed: s d0 Throttle 80 s d0 CombustionLimiter 80 j main pulseSlow: s d0 Throttle 0 s d0 CombustionLimiter 0 sleep 4 s d0 Throttle 10 s d0 CombustionLimiter 10 sleep 1 l CurrentStress d0 Stress l CurrentRPM d0 Rpm blt CurrentStress LowStress main blt CurrentRPM MinRPM preStart j main pause: s d0 Throttle 0 s d0 CombustionLimiter 0 sleep 4 j medSpeed spinDown: s d0 On 0 l CurrentRPM d0 Rpm blt CurrentRPM MinRPM preStart j spinDown
